scripts.setup-taskmanager: git clone https://github.com/j-651/TaskManager.git && cd TaskManager && yarn install && composer install && copy .env.example .env && php artisan key:generate && php artisan storage:link && yarn run cache
scripts.clear-cache: php artisan cache:clear && php artisan config:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear && composer dump-autoload
scripts.cache: php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache
